Piertoberfest 2025

Signature Events Explore The St. Pete Pier™ Signature Events The St. Pete Pier is your premier destination for signature events all year! Along the waterfront of Tampa Bay, the Pier presents a diverse lineup of festivities, offering something for everyone to enjoy. From cultural celebrations to family-friendly events, our calendar is brimming with excitement. Join us throughout the year for unforgettable and unique exPIERiences. The St. Pete Pier Turns 5 Celebrate 5 years of the St. Pete Pier with a full month of weekend events this July. Think fireworks, fitness fests, a massive drone show, local artists, live music on multiple stages, and over 50 ice cream vendors. Whether you’re a local or a visitor, this is one party you won’t want to miss. Learn More “The Fourth” Independence Day Celebration This exciting summer event is filled with fun activities for all, including the St. Pete Pier Run, Uncle Sam’s Market, a craft beer garden, family fun zone, food trucks, roaming entertainers, and live music on the Visit St. Pete Clearwater Main Stage. The spectacular Fourth of July fireworks show is sponsored by the City of St. Petersburg and is visible from the entire downtown waterfront, illuminating the sky with dazzling colors. Learn More NYE at the Pier Join us for an unforgettable celebration to ring in the New Year at St. Pete Pier, featuring live DJs spinning the hottest tracks, local food trucks serving up delicious eats, and festive bar cocktails to toast the New Year. The highlight? The city’s biggest fireworks extravaganza, illuminating the sky at midnight. Don’t miss your chance to welcome 2025 with friends, family, and all the excitement you could ask for. Learn More St. Pete Pier Spring Festival & Easter Egg Hunt Hop into action at the St. Pete Pier Spring Festival. Bring the whole family and spring into an event packed with fun, including an egg-citing Easter Egg Hunt, a bounce-tastic Bounce Zone, and so much more. Don’t be a bunny on the sidelines – join what’s happening at the Pier this spring. Learn More St. Pete Pier Pumpkin Patch Experience the magic of fall at the St Pete Pier Pumpkin Patch! Wander amidst a sprawling field of vibrant, plump pumpkins, ready for picking and purchase. Whether you’re on the hunt for the perfect pumpkin or simply eager to soak in the festive ambiance, our patch is open to everyone at no admission fee. Join us for a delightful autumnal experience, and let the memories last a lifetime. Learn More

Event Calendar

There's always something exciting happening at St. Pete Pier! Beyond our exciting lineup of signature events, additional experiences are waiting for you!
